name: Dracosteel
description: Steel that burns with the glory of dragons.

name: Dragonsbeard
description: A long, fibrous plant that burns with the glory of dragons.

name: Dragonstear
description: A scorching-hot gem that burns with the glory of dragons.

name: Valkor
description: A prismatic metal that gleams with heavenly light. It shines brightly in the presence of a valorous heart.

name: Valryd
description: A sturdy vine speckled with yellow and white flowers. They are said to strengthen one's resolve.

name: Valss
description: A prismatic crystal prized for its distinctive flavor in cooking. Some claim it bolsters one's courage.
